product_name: Pearl Izumi Thermal Conductive Bike Gloves - Women's
long_description: Think you've taken the wrong fork in the road? The Pearl Izumi Thermal Conductive women's bike gloves lets you check the map on your smartphone while keeping your fingers covered in cold weather. P.R.O. Thermal fabric provides optimal insulation, moisture transfer, dry time and odor-resistance. Conductive synthetic fabric on index finger and thumb works with touchscreen devices. Fleece fabric on thumb provides a soft place to wipe your nose. Silicone-screened palm gives you a reliable grip. Pearl Izumi Thermal Conductive women's bike gloves feature reflective elements for increased visibility in low light.
